  • vfricou.system.shell role – Shell configuration

vfricou.system.shell role – Shell configuration

Note

This role is part of the vfricou.system collection (version 1.0.0).

It is not included in ansible-core. To check whether it is installed, run ansible-galaxy collection list.

To install it use: ansible-galaxy collection install vfricou.system.

To use it in a playbook, specify: vfricou.system.shell.

  • Entry point main – Shell configuration

    • Synopsis

    • Parameters

    • Authors

Entry point main – Shell configuration

Synopsis

  • Configure GNU/Linux shells

Parameters

Parameter

Comments

shell_asdf_access_group

string

ASDF system group to allow binary usage

Default: "asdfusers"

shell_asdf_dl_url

string

ASDF base URL to download package

Default: "https://github.com/asdf-vm/asdf/releases/download/{{ shell_asdf_version }}"

shell_asdf_force_update

boolean

Force ASDF update to specified version

Choices:

  • false ← (default)

  • true

shell_asdf_install

boolean

Activate ASDF tool installation

Choices:

  • false ← (default)

  • true

shell_asdf_pkg_name

string

ASDF package name

Default: "asdf-{{ shell_asdf_version }}-linux-amd64.tar.gz"

shell_asdf_version

string

Define ASDF version to install

Default: "v0.18.0"

shell_bash_prompt_colors_enabled

boolean

Enable colored bash prompt

Choices:

  • false

  • true ← (default)

shell_bash_prompt_host_color

string

Define host prompt part color

Choices:

  • "dark_gray"

  • "black"

  • "light_red"

  • "red"

  • "light_green"

  • "green"

  • "yellow"

  • "brown"

  • "light_blue" ← (default)

  • "blue"

  • "light_purple"

  • "purple"

  • "light_cyan"

  • "cyan"

  • "white"

  • "light_gray"

shell_config_users

list / elements=string

Define user list where to update shell rc installed

Default: ["root"]

shell_direnv_access_group

string

Direnv system group to allow binary usage

Default: "direnvusers"

shell_direnv_dl_url

string

Base URL to download Direnv package

Default: "https://github.com/direnv/direnv/releases/download/{{ shell_direnv_version }}"

shell_direnv_force_update

boolean

Force Direnv update to specified version

Choices:

  • false ← (default)

  • true

shell_direnv_install

boolean

Activate Direnv tool installation

Choices:

  • false ← (default)

  • true

shell_direnv_pkg_name

string

Direnv package name

Default: "direnv.linux-amd64"

shell_direnv_version

string

Direnv version to install

Default: "v2.36.0"

shell_to_configure

string

Define shell to configure

Choices:

  • "bash" ← (default)

  • "zsh"

shell_zsh_install

boolean

Install ZSH shell

Choices:

  • false ← (default)

  • true

shell_zsh_omz_install

boolean

Install Oh-My-Zsh

Choices:

  • false

  • true ← (default)

shell_zsh_omz_plugins

list / elements=string

Oh-My-Zsh plugins to activate

Limited choices of plugins for this role

Refer to https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/tree/master/plugins for plugins details

Choices:

  • "asdf"

  • "colored-man-pages" ← (default)

  • "direnv"

  • "eza"

  • "git" ← (default)

  • "history"

  • "k9s"

  • "mercurial"

  • "zsh-interactive-cd" ← (default)

Default: ["git", "colored-man-pages", "zsh-interactive-cd"]

shell_zsh_omz_repo

string

Oh-My-Zsh repository

Default: "https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh.git"

shell_zsh_omz_theme

string

Oh-My-Zsh theme

Choices:

  • "robbyrussell"

  • "agnoster" ← (default)

shell_zsh_omz_update

string

Activate Oh-My-Zsh auto-update

disabled : Manually update Oh-My-Zsh

auto : Automatically update Oh-My-Zsh

reminder : Just remind to update Oh-My-Zsh

Choices:

  • "disabled"

  • "auto"

  • "reminder" ← (default)

shell_zsh_omz_update_frequency

integer

Oh-My-Zsh update frequency in days

Default: 13

  • Vincent FRICOU
